Title: Is the Coros Nomad really an adventure watch?
Description:
Coros' Nomad is marketed as a "go-anywhere, do-anything" adventure watch.
It's got GPS and offline maps and will track a lot of activities, from yoga to bouldering.
There's an "Adventure Journal," which the marketing copy promises will help you record "every …

Title: I was ready to die for the Taliban. Now I hope I can prevent others becoming radicalised
Description: Born in Afghanistan, Maiwand Banaye says he was radicalised as a teenager in a refugee camp in Pakistan, after his family fled civil war at home.

Title: How to use AI on your Android phone
Description:
AI is everywhere, and your phone has plenty of cool features that use machine learning.

Title: Cardi B Delayed Video for BIA Diss Track to Avoid ‘Bullying’ Rapper on Her Album Release Day
